page.title: 02Airton
page.content: {Airton}is the largest village in the block,and was originally built around the village green.The name "Airton" means "Town on the River Aire". Although it did have its own school,this was closed in 1974 and the children came to Kirkby Malham School. It has its own Post Office and village shop(this seels mainly sweets),and a garage which sells petrol as well as repairs cars. Between Airton and Kirkby Malham there are several farms,including Manor House Farm,Dykelands,Skellands and Stoneybers.At Skellands,part of the buildings have been given over to car repairs.
